# WEB

###  DOM&jQuery-DOM



## 	DOM4020

1.	 $(arg) DOM

	* var dom = $('#id'); // DOMID
	* var dom = $('.classname'); // DOMcss class
	* var dom = $('a'); // DOM

	IE8/9/10/11ChromeFirefox360

2.	 getOrSetDomAttr(dom,attrName,attrValue) DOM
	
	* var imgSrc = getOrSetDomAttr(dom,'src'); // src
	* getOrSetDomAttr(dom,'src','http://www.baidu.com/a.png'); // src

## 

**  ** 

### 

* for label 
```HTML
<input type="checkbox" name="is_remember" id="is_remember"/>
<label for="is_remember"></label>
```
    *  



* placeholder
```HTML
<input type="text" name="username" id="username" placeholder="//"/>
```
```JavaScript
_isSupportPlaceholder:function(){
	return 'placeholder' in document.createElement('input')
}
```
    * 
    * `_isSupportPlaceholder``placeholder`DOMplaceholder



* tabindex
```HTML
<input type='text' name="username" tabindex="1">
<input type='text' name="password" tabindex="2">
<input type='submit' value="" tabindex="3">
```



* hover,focus
```CSS
input{background:#}
input:hover{background:#}
input:focus{background:#}
```
    * 



* 
```JavaScript
ele.value = "";
ele.focus();
```
    * 



* ...
```JavaScript
ele.value = ""
```
    * 



* 
```JavaScript
setTimeout(function(){
    if(!isLogin){
        showMsg('')
    }
},5000)
```
    * 



* 
```JavaScript
var isShift = e.shiftKey || (keyCode == 16) || false
if (((keyCode >= 65 && keyCode <= 90) && !isShift) || ((keyCode >= 97 && keyCode <= 122) && isShift)) {
    //do something here
}
```

Post.title: RSA
Post._content:
http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/blog_6c9eaa150100rpot.html

when I ssh to log on the server,
there is a error msg: 


	@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
	@    WARNING: REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION HAS CHANGED!     @
	@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
	IT IS POSSIBLE THAT SOMEONE IS DOING SOMETHING NASTY!
	Someone could be eavesdropping on you right now (man-in-the-middle attack)!
	It is also possible that the RSA host key has just been changed.
	The fingerprint for the RSA key sent by the remote host is
	28:5d:a3:42:1f:ac:d5:2b:9a:6a:b1:28:b1:6b:55:f8.
	Please contact your system administrator.
	Add correct host key in /home/whfwind/.ssh/known_hosts to get rid of this message.
	Offending key in /home/whfwind/.ssh/known_hosts:2
	RSA host key for 192.168.100.5 has changed and you have requested strict checking.
	Host key verification failed.

then I searched on the internet, so I collected here:
you just need to delete or annote the line of your home ~/.ssh/known_host file of the IP you have failed logged
Post.raw:
title: RSA
date: 2014-05-16 01:53:15
tags: RSA
---

 http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/blog_6c9eaa150100rpot.html

when I ssh to log on the server,
there is a error msg: 


	@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
	@    WARNING: REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION HAS CHANGED!     @
	@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
	IT IS POSSIBLE THAT SOMEONE IS DOING SOMETHING NASTY!
	Someone could be eavesdropping on you right now (man-in-the-middle attack)!
	It is also possible that the RSA host key has just been changed.
	The fingerprint for the RSA key sent by the remote host is
	28:5d:a3:42:1f:ac:d5:2b:9a:6a:b1:28:b1:6b:55:f8.
	Please contact your system administrator.
	Add correct host key in /home/whfwind/.ssh/known_hosts to get rid of this message.
	Offending key in /home/whfwind/.ssh/known_hosts:2
	RSA host key for 192.168.100.5 has changed and you have requested strict checking.
	Host key verification failed.

then I searched on the internet, so I collected here:
you just need to delete or annote the line of your home ~/.ssh/known_host file of the IP you have failed logged

Post.title: GIT
Post._content:
gitsvn

###github


- git: [http://rogerdudler.github.io/git-guide/index.zh.html](http://rogerdudler.github.io/git-guide/index.zh.html)
- git:[http://www.cnblogs.com/zhangjing230/archive/2012/05/09/2489745.html#gitdefintion](http://www.cnblogs.com/zhangjing230/archive/2012/05/09/2489745.html#gitdefintion)

- second: [http://my.oschina.net/meilihao/blog/157716](http://my.oschina.net/meilihao/blog/157716)

- jeykyll:[http://jekyllcn.com/](http://jekyllcn.com/)
- jekyll:[https://github.com/jekyll/jekyll/wiki/Sites](https://github.com/jekyll/jekyll/wiki/Sites)
- jekyll1:[http://blog.csdn.net/on_1y/article/details/19259435](http://blog.csdn.net/on_1y/article/details/19259435)
- jekyll2:[http://higrid.net/c-art-jeklly_template_data.htm](http://higrid.net/c-art-jeklly_template_data.htm)

###github

- [http://qbaty.iteye.com/blog/865368](http://qbaty.iteye.com/blog/865368)[http://joshuasabrina.iteye.com/blog/1816597](http://joshuasabrina.iteye.com/blog/1816597)[http://xiaocong.github.io/blog/2013/03/20/team-collaboration-with-github/](http://xiaocong.github.io/blog/2013/03/20/team-collaboration-with-github/)








###

1

    git config --global user.name 'conan'

    git add .    

conan

    git status    

9commit()log

    git commit -m "ready change"
    git commit --amend -m "change commit text"
    git log
    

10git add .[][1] 2

    git add -A . && git commit -m "delete file"    

    git commit -am "delte file"    

11

    git clone --bare . ../remote-repository.git     

12

    git commmit -am "read push remote"
    git push ../remote-repository.git
    

13

    git init -help
    git  add -help     

14"origin"

    #
    git remote add shortname ../remote-repository.git



echo 'change' test01



    git commit -am "update of short name"



    git push shortname
    

15

    git remote     

15

    git clone https://github.com/webzhangnan/rocket_apps.git    

16

(https://github.com/webzhangnan/rocket_apps.gitmaster)



    git fetch https://github.com/webzhangnan/rocket_apps.git    



    git merge https://github.com/webzhangnan/rocket_apps.git

18 log

    git log --all    

checkoutcommit_namecommit

    git revert commit_name

Post.title: Node.js
Post._content:
# Node.js


## Node.js

Node.js`node -v`Node.js

```
$ node -v
```

## node

`node`Node.js

```
$ node
> console.log('hello world!') # 
```

![](http://wilee.me/demo/photo/node.gif)

## Node.js


`helloworld.js`

```
console.log('hello world!');
```

`node`

```
$ node helloworld.js
```

![](http://wilee.me/demo/photo/node_1.gif)

## node server()

`server.js`

```
// 
var port = '8000';

// server,'hello world!'
var server = require('http').createServer(function(req, res){
  res.end('hello world!');
});

// server
server.listen(port);

console.log('server started at http://192.168.1.10:'+port);
```

`node server.js`

`server started at http://192.168.1.10:8000` 

http://192.168.1.10:8000  , 'hello world!'

![](http://wilee.me/demo/photo/node_2.gif)
Post.raw:
title: Node.js
date: 2016-03-24 19:21:00
tags: Node.js
category: 
---

# Node.js


## Node.js

Node.js`node -v`Node.js

```
$ node -v
```

## node

`node`Node.js

```
$ node
> console.log('hello world!') # 
```

![](http://wilee.me/demo/photo/node.gif)

## Node.js


`helloworld.js`

```
console.log('hello world!');
```

`node`

```
$ node helloworld.js
```

![](http://wilee.me/demo/photo/node_1.gif)

## node server()

`server.js`

```
// 
var port = '8000';

// server,'hello world!'
var server = require('http').createServer(function(req, res){
  res.end('hello world!');
});

// server
server.listen(port);

console.log('server started at http://192.168.1.10:'+port);
```

`node server.js`

`server started at http://192.168.1.10:8000` 

http://192.168.1.10:8000  , 'hello world!'

![](http://wilee.me/demo/photo/node_2.gif)
